text: sivaay un logon ke jo aise logon se sambandh rakhate hon, jinase tumhaare aur unakee beech koee samajhauta ho ya ve tumhaare paas is dasha mein aaen ki unake dil isase tang ho rahe hon ki ve tumase lade ya apane logon se ladaee karen. yadi allaah chaahata to unhen tumapar qaaboo de deta. phir to ve tumase avashy ladate; to yadi ve tumase alag rahen aur tumase na laden aur sandhi ke lie tumhaaree or haath badhaen to unake viruddh allaah ne tumhaare lie koee raasta nahin rakha hai
